comments.comment:
ending(maybe)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Em
Come and see
look on this mystery
The Lord of the universe
nailed to a tree

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Christ our God
spilling His holy blood
Bowing in anguish
His sacred head

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Sing to Jesus
Lord of our shame
Lord of our sinful hearts
He is our great redeemer

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Sing to Jesus
Honor His name
Sing of His faithfulness
Pouring His life out unto death

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Come - you will
and He will give you rest
Come you who mourn
lay on His breast

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Christ who died
risen in paradise
Giver of mercy
Giver of life

verse.name: c2a
verse.lines:
Sing to Jesus
His is the throne
Now and forever
He is the King of Heaven

verse.name: c2b
verse.lines:
Sing to Jesus
we are His own
Now and forever
Sing for the love our God has shown
